tool_purpose: Calculates the internal cross-sectional area of a pipe based on diameter.

inputs.label: Pipe Inner Diameter
inputs.explanation: The internal diameter of the pipe.

outputs.label: Pipe Area
outputs.description: Internal cross-sectional area of the pipe.

assumptions: No deformation or ovality is present.

seo.meta_description: Calculate the internal cross-sectional area of a pipe using diameter.

tool_notes.title: How this calculator works
tool_notes.text: The calculator uses the standard area formula π × r².
